channel.title: What are the weirdest sounds that people actually want?
channel.description:
What are some strange but useful sounds people want?
Marimba?
Bongos?
Air horns?
You tell me.

item.title: What are the weirdest sounds that people actually want?
item.dc:creator: Zoruwhite
item.description:
The crunch of it leaves, when you hit it, it’s like bass kick, you can smack two pieces of cabbage together and you have a snare! You can rub the surface to create interesting sweeps (etc.)
Hope these are enough to answer your question

item.title: What are the weirdest sounds that people actually want?
item.dc:creator: LunarAura
item.description:
Dubstep basses and screeches

I overhyped the automation update way too much because I wanted to wub. There was no sounds that had a gud wub. Turns out the automation thing is more of a pain because it doesn’t automatically set the last point of the automation to the first when u make a new scene.

Read full topic

item.title: What are the weirdest sounds that people actually want?
item.dc:creator: anon77950895
item.description:
JBLAK:

Video game sounds like coins and voice lines.

8 bit

That would be cool!
I’ve wanted violin sounds too (wasn’t sure if there were any similar sounds in other sound packs yet though)

(Btw not sure but would this topic fit in the #feedback category? because it seemed to fit along with the other ideas, even if it’s more wacky )
